1.name: epicbossbattle
1.description: is a tough, rage project where you have to avoid and end a spaceship without dying in the process! Use the retry button to restart the game when needed.

1.name: bitcoinclicker
1.description: is a 'Cookie Clicker' similar type gam- but instead it's bitcoin!

1.name: cookieclicker
1.description: is exactly what it sounds like. You know what it is- why not play it?

1.name: papaspizzeria
1.description: is the original classic of the Papa gams. Own a pizza business and get the best scores!

1.name: papasburgeria
1.description: is one of the sequels to Papa's Pizzeria. Why not give both a try?

1.name: ageofwar2
1.description: is a war simulation gam where you try to win a war aganist a computer enemy!

1.name: run2
1.description: is excatly what is sounds like- RUN! You can jump and move around to make it to the next level.

1.name: whackyourboss
1.description: might not the the most family friendly gam out there- but it is sure fun to play after a rough day.

1.name: ducklife
1.description: is a gam where you have to train a duck to get your farm back!

1.name: theimpossiblequiz
1.description: is a super hard gam with over 100 questions! Can you beat it?

1.name: worldhardgame
1.description: is a super hard gam with a bunch of levels... can you beat it?

1.name: portaltheflashversion
1.description: is the '2D version' of Portal.. can you get through the test chambers?

1.name: ageofwar
1.description: is the original version of Age of War 2. Give it a try!

1.name: papafreezeria
1.description: is another sequal to the Papa franschise. This time- deserts!
